title: Estonia Private Debt to GDP
description: Private Debt to GDP in Estonia decreased to 168.80 percent in 2021 from 179.40 percent in 2020. Private Debt to GDP in Estonia averaged 155.23 percent from 1995 until 2021, reaching an all time high of 205.40 percent in 2009 and a record low of 65.20 percent in 1995. Private sector debt to GDP measures the indebtedness of both sectors, non-financial corporations and households and non-profit institutions serving households, as a percentage of GDP.
author: OECD
